footer.tagline: High-quality pet food and supplies for the health and happiness of your pets.

homepage.heroSubtitle: Unlock your dog's potential with our scientifically formulated, premium-quality food. Because a healthy dog is a happy dog.
homepage.productsCardSubtitle: Explore our curated collection of premium products for your best friend.
homepage.whyChooseUsSubtitle: We are dedicated to providing your dog with the highest quality nutrition, crafted from natural ingredients to support their health and vitality at every stage of life.
homepage.naturalIngredientsText: Our formulas are made with carefully selected, wholesome ingredients, free from artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives.
homepage.scientificallyFormulatedText: Developed by veterinarians and nutritionists to meet the specific needs of dogs for optimal health.
homepage.trustedQualityText: We adhere to the strictest quality control standards to ensure every bag of food is safe and nutritious.

NPSC47236.details:
This grain free dry dog food features RCE Complex (Red Coat Enhancer Balanced Amino Acid Complex) to protect and enhance the natural pigmentation of brown and red coats while reducing brown tear stains around the eyes, mouth, and paws. With Lamb as the main protein source, rich in essential nutrients, it can help to support muscle development, cognitive function, and skin and coat health. The high-quality ingredients ensure excellent digestibility and palatability, making it perfect for red and brown-coated dogs while supporting overall health, including immunity, joints, and digestion.

Weight: 4 kg

**Benefits**
- Hypoallergenic
- Red and brown coat color enhancer
- Tear stains off formula
- Highest quality ingredients
- Natural antioxidants
- Balanced nutrition
- Grain free
- Super premium

**Key Ingredients**
- Lamb protein source: highly digestible and maintains overall health
- MicroZeoGen: for body detox and immune system
- Balanced amino acid complex: helps to enhance natural coat pigment

**Formulated Without**
- Artificial colors and flavorings
- Preservatives

Nature's Protection Red Coat Grain Free Lamb Adult All Breed dogs are created with RCE Complex (Red Coat Enhancer Balanced Amino Acid Complex), a balanced amino acid complex that helps protect and enhance the natural pigmentation of brown and red coat. The main protein source of this dry dog food is Lamb. It is a high quality protein that is an excellent source of nutrition for dogs, as it is packed with essential nutrients that can help promote good health. This dry dog food's complete and balanced composition is enriched with natural supplements like MicroZeoGen that help remove toxins from the body and support a healthy immune system. The composition is enriched with Omega-3 and Omega-6 fatty acids essential for healthy skin and coat conditions. As well as mono- and polyunsaturated fatty acids support the immune system, while saturated fatty acids provide energy to a dog.

NATURE'S PROTECTION Superior care – Super Premium dry dog food line is known for innovative ingredients and the newest technologies in healthy pet nutrition. This complete dog food contains only the highest quality ingredients and protein sources.
NPSC47236.components: COMPOSITION: lamb meat 38 % (dried and finely ground), dried potato pulp, sweet potato, peas, poultry fat, krill meal (4%), sugar beet pulp, dynamic micronized clinoptilolite (1 %), dicalcium phosphate, salmon oil, linseed, fructooligosaccharides (FOS), yucca extract, green tea extract, marigold dried (source of lutein), glucosamine (250 mg/kg), chondroitin sulphate (100 mg/kg).
NPSC47236.vitaminsAndMinerals:
ADDITIVES/PER 1 KG: Nutritional additives: vitamin A (3a672a) – 18 000 IU, vitamin D3 (3a671)* – 1 500 IU, vitamin E (3a700) – 530 mg, folic acid (3a316) – 1 mg, biotin (3a880) – 0,1 mg, iron (II) sulphate monohydrate (3b103) – 50 mg, calcium iodate anhydrous (3b202) –  1,5 mg, copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate (3b405) – 5 mg, manganous sulphate monohydrate (3b503) – 20 mg, zinc sulphate monohydrate (3b605) –  115 mg, sodium selenite (3b801) –  0,1 mg, L-tyrosine (3c401) – 500 mg, L-cystine (3c391) – 1 g, L-tryptophan (3c440) – 500 mg. Technological additives: rosemary extract, tocopherol extracts from vegetable oils (1b306(i)).
*Simultaneous use with Vitamin D2 is not allowed.

ANALYTICAL CONSTITUENTS: crude protein – 25 %, crude fibre – 2 %, crude fat – 14 %, crude ash – 10,6 %, calcium – 1,9 %, phosphorus – 1,15 %, potassium – 0,65 %, sodium – 0,35 %, Omega-3 fatty acids – 0,97 %, Omega-6 fatty acids – 2,84 %.

- Vitamin A - important for maintaining healthy skin, promoting good vision, and supporting a strong immune system.
- Vitamin D3 - supports the regulation of calcium and phosphorus levels in the body, helps with healthy bone growth and development.
- Vitamin E - acts as an antioxidant in the body, helps to protect cells from damage caused by free radicals, is important for immune function and skin health.
- Folic acid - also known as vitamin B9, takes a part in many bodily functions, including DNA synthesis and repair, cell division, and red blood cell formation.
- Biotin - also known as vitamin B7, important for pets with skin and coat issues, as it supports healthy skin and hair growth.
- Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate - a source of iron, which is important for the formation of hemoglobin in red blood cells, which carries oxygen throughout the body. A deficiency in iron can lead to anemia, fatigue, and weakness in pets
- Calcium iodate anhydrous - a source of iodine, which is important for the production of thyroid hormones, which regulate metabolism and other bodily functions. A deficiency in iodine can lead to thyroid problems, weight gain, and other health problems in pets.
- Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate - a source of copper, which is important for the formation of red blood cells, connective tissue, and other bodily functions. A deficiency in copper can lead to anemia, bone and joint problems, and other health problems in pets.
- Manganous sulphate monohydrate - a source of manganese, which is important for the formation of bones, cartilage, and other connective tissue. It's also involved in the metabolism of carbohydrates and fats. A deficiency in manganese can lead to skeletal deformities, poor growth, and other health problems in pets.
- Zinc sulphate monohydrate - a source of zinc, which is important for the immune system, wound healing, skin health, and other bodily functions. A deficiency in zinc can lead to poor growth, skin lesions, and other health problems in pets.
- Sodium selenite - a source of selenium, which is important for the immune system, thyroid function, and other bodily functions. A deficiency in selenium can lead to muscle weakness, reproductive problems, and other health problems in pets.
- L-tyrosine - helps improve cognitive function and support healthy brain function. L-tyrosine is also involved in the production of melanin, the pigment that gives color to skin and hair.
- L-cystine - is involved in the production of keratin, which is a key component of skin and hair.
- L-tryptophan - supports healthy brain function, supports musclo growth and recovery, and is a precursor to melanin, which is the pigment that gives color to skin and hair.
NPSC47236.instructions: FEEDING INSTRUCTION: serve the food dry. Fresh water should be available at all times.

NPSC47230.details:
This grain free dry dog food features RCE Complex (Red Coat Enhancer Balanced Amino Acid Complex) to protect and enhance the natural pigmentation of brown and red coats while reducing brown tear stains around the eyes, mouth, and paws. With Salmon as the main protein source, rich in Omega-3 fatty acids, especially DHA, it can help to support muscle development, cognitive function, and skin and coat health. The high-quality ingredients ensure excellent digestibility and palatability, making it perfect for red and brown-coated dogs while supporting overall health, including immunity, joints, and digestion.

Weight: 1.5 kg

**Benefits**
- Hypoallergenic
- Red and brown coat color enhancer
- Tear stains off formula
- High digestibility
- Highest quality ingredients
- Natural antioxidants
- Balanced nutrition
- Grain free
- Super premium

**Key Ingredients**
- Salmon protein source: highly digestible and beneficial for skin
- Antarctic krill: unique and 100% sustainable source of Omega-3 and choline
- MicroZeoGen: for body detox and immune system
- Balanced amino acid complex: helps to enhance natural coat pigment

**Formulated Without**
- Artificial colors and flavorings
- Preservatives

Nature's Protection Red Coat Grain Free with Salmon for Adult Small Breed dogs is well known for its RCE Complex '(Red Coat Enhancer Balanced Amino Acid Complex), a balanced composition that helps protect and enhance the natural pigmentation of the brown and red coats and maintain the clear tiers and saliva composition. The main source of protein in this dry dog food is Salmon. It is a high quality protein that is an excellent source of nutrition for dogs, as it is packed with essential nutrients that can help promote good health. It also contains an Antarctic krill, a unique and 100% sustainable source of Omega-3 and choline, which improves skin and coat condition, supports brain activity. The complete and balanced composition of this dry dog food is enriched with clinoptilolite of volcanic origin from nature - MicroZeoGen. It helps to remove toxins from the pet's body and when it is detoxified the efficient nutrients, vitamins, and minerals easily absorb into the body. The composition is enriched with Omega-3 and Omega-6 fatty acids essential for healthy skin and coat conditions. As well as mono- and polyunsaturated fatty acids support the immune system, while saturated fatty acids provide energy to a dog.

NATURE'S PROTECTION Superior care – Super Premium dry dog food line is known for innovative ingredients and the newest technologies in healthy pet nutrition. This complete dog food contains only the highest quality ingredients and protein sources.
NPSC47230.components: COMPOSITION: salmon 44 % (dried and finely ground), dried potato pulp, peas, sweet potato, poultry fat, krill meal (4 %), sugar beet pulp, salmon oil, monocalcium phosphate, dynamic micronized clinoptilolite (1 %), linseed, fructooligosaccharides (FOS), yucca extract, cranberry dried, marigold dried (source of lutein).
NPSC47230.vitaminsAndMinerals:
ADDITIVES/1 kg: nutritional additives: vitamin A (3a672a) – 18 000 IU, vitamin D3 (3a671)* – 1 500 IU, vitamin E (3a700) – 530 mg, folic acid (3a316) – 1 mg, biotin (3a880) – 1 mg, iron (II) sulphate monohydrate (3b103) – 50 mg, calcium iodate anhydrous (3b202) – 1,5 mg, copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate (3b405) – 5 mg, manganous sulphate monohydrate (3b503) – 20 mg, zinc sulphate monohydrate (3b605) – 115 mg, sodium selenite (3b801) –  0,1 mg, L-tyrosine (3c401) – 500 mg, L-cystine (3c391) – 1 g, L-tryptophan (3c440) – 500 mg. Technological additives: rosemary extract, tocopherol extracts from vegetable oils (1b306(i)).
*Simultaneous use with Vitamin D2 is not allowed.

ANALYTICAL CONSTITUENTS: crude protein – 27%, crude fibre – 3%, crude fat – 17%, crude ash – 8,5%, calcium – 1,5%, phosphorus – 1,2%, potassium – 0,6%, sodium – 0,5%, Omega-3 fatty acids – 0,82%, Omega-6 fatty acids – 2,48%.

- Vitamin A - important for maintaining healthy skin, promoting good vision, and supporting a strong immune system.
- Vitamin D3 - supports the regulation of calcium and phosphorus levels in the body, helps with healthy bone growth and development.
- Vitamin E - acts as an antioxidant in the body, helps to protect cells from damage caused by free radicals, is important for immune function and skin health.
- Folic acid - also known as vitamin B9, takes a part in many bodily functions, including DNA synthesis and repair, cell division, and red blood cell formation.
- Biotin - also known as vitamin B7, important for pets with skin and coat issues, as it supports healthy skin and hair growth.
- Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate - a source of iron, which is important for the formation of hemoglobin in red blood cells, which carries oxygen throughout the body. A deficiency in iron can lead to anemia, fatigue, and weakness in pets
- Calcium iodate anhydrous - a source of iodine, which is important for the production of thyroid hormones, which regulate metabolism and other bodily functions. A deficiency in iodine can lead to thyroid problems, weight gain, and other health problems in pets.
- Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate - a source of copper, which is important for the formation of red blood cells, connective tissue, and other bodily functions. A deficiency in copper can lead to anemia, bone and joint problems, and other health problems in pets.
- Manganous sulphate monohydrate - a source of manganese, which is important for the formation of bones, cartilage, and other connective tissue. It's also involved in the metabolism of carbohydrates and fats. A deficiency in manganese can lead to skeletal deformities, poor growth, and other health problems in pets.
- Zinc sulphate monohydrate - a source of zinc, which is important for the immune system, wound healing, skin health, and other bodily functions. A deficiency in zinc can lead to poor growth, skin lesions, and other health problems in pets.
- Sodium selenite - a source of selenium, which is important for the immune system, thyroid function, and other bodily functions. A deficiency in selenium can lead to muscle weakness, reproductive problems, and other health problems in pets.
- L-tyrosine - helps improve cognitive function and support healthy brain function. L-tyrosine is also involved in the production of melanin, the pigment that gives color to skin and hair.
- L-cystine - is involved in the production of keratin, which is a key component of skin and hair.
- L-tryptophan - supports healthy brain function, supports musclo growth and recovery, and is a precursor to melanin, which is the pigment that gives color to skin and hair.
NPSC47230.instructions: Feeding instruction: serve the food dry. Clean, fresh water should be available at all times.
